snippet: Restaurants used to pay to get rid of it, but with the oil being used to make biofuel, thieves are siphoning it off before paying contractors can get to it.
abstract: Some thieves are siphoning off used cooking oil from restaurant holding containers before paying contractors can arrive to take it; oil's value has increased rapidly as people have begun using it to make biofuel.
lead_paragraph: Restaurants used to pay to get rid of it, but with the oil being used to make biofuel, thieves are siphoning it off before paying contractors can get to it.

headline.seo: Restaurants’ Used Fryer Oil Attracting Thieves
headline.main: Thieves Seek Restaurants’ Used Fryer Oil
headline.print_headline: Thieves Seek Restaurants’ Used Fryer Oil
